text: The Sierra Leone national under-17 football team is team of football players under 17 from Sierra Leone. The team is controlled by Sierra Leone Football Association and played in the 2003 FIFA U-17 World Championship in Finland. ==FIFA U-17 World Cup appearances== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup record=== FIFA
